meanings.definition: People who live together in a romantic or sexual relationship.
meanings.sent1: The cohabitees shared a cozy apartment.
meanings.sent2: Many cohabitees choose to split household chores.
meanings.sent3: The cohabitees argued over whose turn it was to do the dishes.
meanings.sent4: Their love made them the perfect cohabitees, always in sync.
meanings.sent5: The cohabitees' laughter filled the room, a true sign of happiness.

meanings.definition: The act of living together in a romantic or sexual relationship.
meanings.sent1: Cohabitees often face challenges when merging their lifestyles.
meanings.sent2: Legal agreements can protect the rights of cohabitees.
meanings.sent3: The cohabitees decided to redecorate their shared space together.
meanings.sent4: Their cohabitees status brought them closer than ever before.
meanings.sent5: The cohabitees' bond grew stronger with each passing day.
